Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Perfect for eating waffles. Whole family liked what they ordered and service minded personal. Guess you can pay with card if your bill is high enough. Only maestro thou. Great waffles and tasty with allot of choices to order. Mid priced I guess. Great for some relaxing and "fika"

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: One of the best pancakes I've ever had and most delicious orange juice too. The waitresses were lovely and we had a great breakfast with great views of the flower market. Everyone here is complaining about price... But its in one of the most touristic areas of the city so it's kinda normal for around there.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Very big food menu but after ordering the lady told me that she did not have half the menu. Also interieur looked really cheap and old. ‚Ä¶

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Amazing food and amazing service. It's the 3rd time I've been in Amsterdam, and I've been here every time. Delicious food and freshly pressed orange juice! üòç

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Cheeseburger was surprisingly good.  Read a lot of negative comments about the staff but good we didn't experience that.  In front of Bloemenmarket.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: I don't have a clue what the other reviews did to the staff to upset them but the staff could not have been nicer. We got a table very quickly, the table was clean. We got severed drinks quickly and our orders were taken quickly and the ‚Ä¶

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Tourist trap. Should have read the reviews... Expensive or rather poor value for money. 8 Euro for 2 cups of tea and a thimble full of milk. But being overcharged is totally my responsibility...on the positive side..seating was comfortable. Toilets were small but acceptably clean. Location is good.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Don't visit this restaurant, it's a tourist trap! Worst experience we had on our trip to Amsterdam. The staff pretended to not understand us properly. We ordered 24 Poffertjes, got 12, asked for the other 12 and paid 2x12 instead of one ‚Ä¶

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: There are a lot of 1 star reviews here but they must have turned themselves around because I had fantastic service, a cheerful waitress and some delicious apple pie! Would recommend as a place to stop and admire some of your purchases from the nearby flower market.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: We went to this place for a coffee and pancakes. We pointed to the poster of mini pancakes on the wall as they waitress didn't speak English. We presented with full size pancakes. When we said we ordered mini pancakes there was an argument ‚Ä¶

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Really fast serving, but that was the only good point on this restaurant. My water was from Aldi (discounter) and the spareribs were dry and didn't taste that good. Also the toilets weren't clean.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Reasonable food, poor service. Staff was polite but I wanted a bagel and got served white bread. They would not serve any tap water. Prices were average but not cheap.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: We all really enjoyed our lunches here. Great pea soup and the sandwiches are healthy. Service is rushed, but friendly and competent. Bathrooms are popular among tourists, so avoid sitting at the rear table.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Food is good but waitor is terrible, because of him i won't bring any friends there anymore nor group as i'm a tour guide. He shouldn't be a waitor, wrong profession and gives bad image to the restaurant. They also want you to pay in cash and if you insist paying with card the waiter say "oh you have cash but you don't wanna give it?"

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Unfriendly service (seems friendly but only at first), mediocre food at best, directly at the Bloemenmarket. Ended there for one menu item. Suffered badly. We should have read the reviews first.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Had a lovely cup of coffee and apple pie here. Waitress was lovely and tentative. Good view to the flower market.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: We had a good experience of both food and service.  It did what it was supposed to and our children enjoyed their breakfast.  Quick and painless.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Fresh clean fast and good stuff great location, only cash

Name: Amarylles
Review Text:
A really bad restaurant with a really bad service.  So not professional and the food isn‚Äôt looking good.
They are liar and bad cooks! They aren‚Äôt able do admit they wrong and make you pay for things you didn‚Äôt ask for!

Name: Amarylles
Review Text:
Better not go into this place. Wrong comandes, rude attitude, non tasty food.
Waiters don't understand you in english and they do anything if you tell them that the comand is wrong. ‚Ä¶

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Not recommended at all. Waitress with rude attitude, bad food, prices like in a normal and nice cafe. Please, avoid this place

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Very fast service and very good food. The staff was really nice. However, it was expensive, I wouldn't go there on a daily service.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Service was good, food was bad...spareribs kinda dry and rubbery like yesterday food or reheated ones...not cheap either...free WiFi and rest room for customers. Avoid if possible, but when in urgent need to stop then don't expect much from this place.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Great Service from Vic. Comfortable. Right by flower market.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: The food was not good and it was expensive for what it is.  Service was lacking as well.  We were rushed out before we were finished.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text:
Can't pay separately, can't pay in bank card, the waitress wanted to sell me some food I didn't order.
Very slow service, the worst restaurant I have been in years. ‚Ä¶

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Coffee was good, but yea was just about tolerable. Bagels and baguettes good, bit choice of brown bread not asked our available

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Asked for scrambled eggs and they couldn't do it, gave me the fried egg even though I said I didn't want it. No butter with the toast without asking either, and expensive for a beer too

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: very rude staff, no stars at all. stay away or keep police phone number at hand, and never come alone - you can be physically assaulted  if you do not order what they want

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Good food for a reasonable price in a very popular place near the flower market. Lots of selection and the wait staff is usually pretty fast and efficient.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Only good for ripping off tourists, ridiculously expensive and bad food/coffee. Should've read the reviews

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Tourist trap! Overpriced, impolite and unacceptable service. Don't go. Rude waiteress and high prices.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Great place for a big breakfast, most dishes will be enough to get you through a tourist-day all the way to dinner time

Name: Amarylles
Review Text:
Very Bad food, we were 8 with no posibility to pay separately ... And even worse they forced us to pay in cash ...
Service not that bad but very expensive toi ...

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: When browsing the flower market, you need a minute to take in the massive range of bulbs, I stopped here for a coffee, double espresso, it was ok. Service was good also

Name: Amarylles
Review Text:
I asked for a glass of tap water, they brought a bottle of water saying that they don‚Äôt serve tap water!
I am living in Amsterdam for 3 years, and it was first time I heard that!
Terrible!

Name: Amarylles
Review Text:
The taste and the quality of our food was bad
:( and the personal was really unfriendly.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Great variety of breakfast/lunch meals. English breakfast was ok, reasonable prices, helpful staff

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Rude staff. They don't know how to serve drinks and will pressurise you to buy something to eat. Avoid!!!

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: It was fantastic experience service and quality of the food is outstanding

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Really unacceptable services. Pure tourist trap. Dont even try it!

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Ok service and the food was also ok. But a bit tad expensive.

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Always find a table... pobably because no one want to be there! The worst staff ever!

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Very expensive place,  bad service and Bad Food.not recomended at all

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: GOOD Hot chocolate , rude staff, woukd not split the bill even though place was empty

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Dont try this place. It is just for ripping off tourists and only has a good location. Just dont go here

Name: Amarylles
Review Text: Rude staff, ridiculously expensive. Should have checked reviews first. Avoid

Review Text: Wierd staff. It seems we got billed for the wrong table...

Review Text: Not a nice service, better to walk further

Review Text: (Translated by Google) The woman behind the bar was friendly but the food was ridiculous and really unpalatable. Hopefully they do better in the future. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) From this cafe twice began their day. The breakfasts are wonderful. A variety of offers for every taste. Delicious coffee and hot chocolate. Amazingly magnificent pastries. The staff is friendly and welcoming. ‚Ä¶
